summary: To get an order for 1,000 yachts from a middle-east sheik, two boat companies have to race 'Göta kanal', a canal through Sweden, east to west. There are no rules in this game and the winner gets the order.
cast: Kim Anderzon|Janne Carlsson|Stig Ossian Ericson|Yvonne Lombard|Nils Eklund|Stig Engström|Magnus Härenstam|Rolv Wesenlund|Per Oscarsson|Georg Rydeberg|Peter Harryson|Svante Grundberg|Lars Amble|Marie Göranzon|Frank Andersson|Kent Andersson|Sten Ardenstam|Christer Boustedt|Ulf Brunnberg|Gösta Engström|Mirjam Eriksson|Weiron Holmberg|Anna-Lotta Larsson|Christer Lindarw|Liselott Lindeborg|Bernt Lundquist|Sune Mangs|Raymond Nederström|Bertil Norström|Anders Nyström|Bo Parnevik|Jannis Pesketzis|Gunvor Pontén|Nadim Sawalha|Michael Segerström|Mona Seilitz|Marvin Yxner|Måns Ekman|Lars Hansson|Bengt Jacobsson|Tony Parkvik|Inger Säfvenberg
keywords: place name in title|actress playing herself|reference to james bond|galley|sleeping in a boat
title: ¿Quién tiró de la cadena?
